Record meetings, get transcripts, and ac: 自动记录会议、获取记录和访问会议笔记。
Your tl;dv API key. You can find this at: 您的tl;dv API 密钥。您可以在 https://tldv.io/app/settings/personal-settings/api-key中找到它

Get meeting transcript by meeting ID: 通过会议 ID 获取会议记录

The date and time when the meeting occur: 举行会议的日期和时间。如果没有提供，将使用目前的日期。

Page number to return (default: 1): 返回的页面编号(默认值：1)

Search meetings up to this date: 在此日期之前搜索会议

\n## Setup Instructions\n\nTo use this t:
## Setup Instructions

To use this trigger, configure a webhook in tl;dv:

1. Go to your tl;dv dashboard
2. Navigate to Settings > Webhooks
3. Add a new webhook
4. Set the **URL** to:
```text
{{webhookUrl}}
```
5. Select the **MeetingReady** event type
6. Choose the scope (User, Team, or Organization level)
7. Save the webhook

The webhook will trigger whenever a meeting finishes processing.

## Setup Instructions

To use this trigger, configure a webhook in tl;dv:

1. Go to your tl;dv dashboard
2. Navigate to Settings > Webhooks
3. Add a new webhook
4. Set the **URL** to:
```text
{{webhookUrl}}
```
5. Select the **TranscriptReady** event type
6. Choose the scope (User, Team, or Organization level)
7. Save the webhook

The webhook will trigger whenever a meeting transcript is generated.
